ISSUE.TITLE: Support package-lock.json for speedy installs
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: npm@5 is out now, introducing `package-lock.json`, which serves a similar purpose to `yarn.lock`. I'm keen to migrate back to NPM from Yarn. Will Now take advantage of this file, [like it does with `yarn.lock`](https://zeit.co/blog/faster-javascript-deployments)?
